Authors: Hudiarto, Agustiningsih, Kamila N.R., Fitriyani N.A.
Title: Modeling of Information System for Licensing and Extension of Special Hajj Pilgrimage Organizer
Source title: Proceedings of 2018 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2018
Affiliations: Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Hudiarto, Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Agustiningsih, Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Kamila, N.R., Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fitriyani, N.A., Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The government has given opportunities to travel agencies referred to as Special Hajj Pilgrimage Organizer (PIHK) to organize pilgrimage. The growth of PIHK has made some problems when applying for licensing and extension of PIHK permit. The objective of this research is to analyze the information system resources in the Ministry of Religious Affairs and provide recommendations to improve the licensing and extension process. The result of this research has found that the Ministry has complicated procedure and bureaucracy and it all done manually. So, in this research we will apply the Business Process Reengineering (BPR) method, with an approach using seven out of ten Business Process Management (BPM) Framework phases. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: business process management framework; business process reengineering; special hajj pilgrimage organizer
Index Keywords: Administrative data processing; Enterprise resource management; Information management; Information systems; Information use; Business process management; Business process re-engineering; special hajj pilgrimage organizer; Travel agency; Reengineering
